  • public class LocalDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    Enhancements: - default character string encoding - BIBBs (B-OWS) (services to implement) - AE-N-A - AE-ACK-A - AE-INFO-A - AE-ESUM-A - SCHED-A - T-VMT-A - T-ATR-A - DM-DDB-A,B - DM-DOB-A,B - DM-DCC-A - DM-TS-A - DM-UTC-A - DM-RD-A - DM-BR-A - NM-CE-A
